original_text: And when Jesus had stepped out of the boat, immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit.
korean_text: 배에서 나오시매 곧 더러운 귀신 들린 사람이 무덤 사이에서 나와 예수를 만나니라

sentences.original_text: And when Jesus had stepped out of the boat
immediately there met him out of the tombs
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 무덤에서 그에게 한 사람이 나아왔는데

sentences.original_text: a man with an unclean spirit
